titleStmt.title: Proclamation against importing victual from Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Signed: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the fifth day of August, and of Our Reign the ninth year, 1697.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
